title: not possible to create folders on ie9
body:
### expected behaviour

by select to create a new folder, it should be create

### actual behaviour
using ie9 the new folder is not created

### steps to reproduce
1. access to owncloud using ie9
2. click on new
3. folder

### server configuration
operating system: windows 7

web server: 
opensuse 12.1 (i586)
version = 12.1
codename =asparagus

owncloud version: version":"4.92.10","versionstring":"5.0 alpha 

### client configuration
browser: ie 9

operating system: window 7

### logs
#### web server error log

```
nothing related
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
nothiing related
```

#### browser log
```
by accesing to the owncloud account we have this:
script5007: unable to get value of the property 'close': object is null or undefined 
scan.php?fallback=true&fallback_id=0&force=false&dir=&requesttoken=f079f765b8c46020adaa, line 419 character 646

by clicking on the new folder:

script5007: unable to get value of the property 'toelement': object is null or undefined 
jquery-visibility.js, line 23 character 4

once we enter the folder name and click ok:

script5007: unable to get value of the property 'close': object is null or undefined 
scan.php?fallback=true&fallback_id=0&force=false&dir=&requesttoken=86c555366e8c1d3f269b, line 419 character 646
